[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Allows you to access and build in your POH.

## /poh view

**Usage**

- `/poh view [build_mode:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `build_mode` | `boolean` | No | View the slots in your PoH. | - |

## /poh wallkit

**Usage**

- `/poh wallkit name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The wallkit you want to pick. | - |

## /poh build

**Usage**

- `/poh build name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The object you want to build. | - |

## /poh destroy

**Usage**

- `/poh destroy name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The object you want to destroy. | - |

## /poh mount_item

**Usage**

- `/poh mount_item name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to mount. | - |

## /poh items

**Usage**

- `/poh items`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

**Examples**

- `/poh build:Demonic throne`
